lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is changing its outreach program after critics said it was turning away the very people it tried to reach.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Dropping Snark for Emotional Appeals to Thwart Extremists
headline.main: U.S. Drops Snark in Favor of Emotion to Undercut Extremists

snippet: The Obama administration is changing its outreach program after critics said it was turning away the very people it tried to reach....
abstract: United States revamps program designed to lure foreign fighters away from extremist groups like Islamic State after officials report that previous efforts failed to stop recruitment; new efforts include using Facebook videos, Instagram ads and other social media to imply joining militants will disappoint parents, tear apart families and leave loved ones with empty lives.
